page.title: 15OUR PETS
page.content:
Many British families enjoy the company of a pet or pets and the people of{Merton}are no exception. Kevin Jury writes---"My pet is called Lucky.He is a black and white cat.My mum feeds him twice a day."
Some families have space for even larger pets. Jamie Standen writes---"Our horse is mostly kept outside but at night he comes in his shed and has his barley."
Other families who live on farms have the opportunity to keep more unusual pets. Esther Wooddisse writes---"I have got a pet duck called Donald.It sits on my knee and I give it 1 or 2 slices of bread and some pigmeal."
